basics.name: Jian Wang
basics.label: PhD Student in Theoretical Microbial Ecology
basics.summary: A doctoral student at KU Leuven, Belgium, focusing on mathematical modeling of microbial communities and social interactions.

work.name: KU Leuven
work.summary: Research focused on developing mathematical tools for analyzing microbial community dynamics.
highlights: Projects include bacterial social interactions, spatial structure, and microbial thermodynamics
Simulation of microbial dynamics using hybrid spatial-temporal models
Advanced use of MATHEMATICA, JAVA-Repast Simphony, and Python for scientific computing
